alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Northern Hidalgo; Starr (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 22 at 2:08AM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Hidalgo, northeastern Starr and south central Brooks Counties through 245 AM CDT... At 207 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of El Sauz, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Puerto Rico, La Gloria, La Reforma, Santa Catarina, El Coyote Ranch Airport, San Isidro, Santa Elena, Delmita and Diamond O Ranch Airport. This includes US Highway 281 between mile markers 736 and 752. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
